widget.faq.item_1.value: Can I cancel a crypto-asset transfer?
widget.faq.item_1.description: Unfortunately, no. All blockchain transactions are irreversible. Please make sure the recipient’s wallet address is correct before sending.
widget.faq.item_2.value: Why is my deposit still pending?
widget.faq.item_2.description:
Fiat currency transactions are credited instantly. If a transaction is declined or not credited, please contact our support team.

 Crypto-asset transactions require confirmations on the blockchain network. The processing time depends on the network load and the type of crypto-asset.
widget.faq.item_3.value: What is the minimum amount to purchase a crypto-asset?
widget.faq.item_3.description: The minimum top-up amount in fiat currency is 2 USD. For specific crypto-assets, the minimum purchase amount will be indicated on the platform before you complete the transaction.
widget.faq.item_4.value: Which crypto-assets are available on Asterium?
widget.faq.item_4.description: The list of available crypto-assets is updated regularly. After registration, you will have access to the current list of supported crypto-assets and trading pairs.
widget.faq.item_5.description: Fees depend on the type of transaction and the crypto-asset. Detailed information about the fees will be available after registering on the platform.
widget.faq.item_6.value: Asterium 平台的安全性如何？
widget.faq.item_6.description: Security is our top priority. We use advanced technologies to protect user data and funds, while strictly complying with the legislation of Uzbekistan in the field of crypto-assets.
widget.faq.item_7.description:
You can reach customer support through:

The official Telegram channel @asterium_help.

Your personal account on the website after registration.

The "Support Service" section in the mobile application.

By email at support@asterium.uz.
widget.faq.item_8.description:
To enhance client security, we have made two-factor authentication (2FA) mandatory.

Create strong passwords and update them regularly.

Do not share your account details with third parties.
widget.faq.item_9.value: 通过 KYC 的要求是什么？
widget.faq.item_9.description: The KYC (identity verification) procedure depends on the user’s citizenship. Registration is only available to users over 18 years old, and detailed instructions will be provided during the registration process.
widget.faq.item_10.value: How to top up the account and withdraw funds?
widget.faq.item_10.description:
Top-ups and withdrawals are available using HUMO/VISA/Mastercard bank cards in fiat currencies UZS and USD. You can also top up through our partner Garant Bank’s cash desks or via SWIFT from anywhere in the world.
It is also possible to receive and send (on/off chain) crypto-assets to well-known exchanges and non-custodial wallets.
widget.faq.item_11.value: How does the Asterium Crypto Card work?
widget.faq.item_11.description: The Asterium Crypto Card allows you to pay for goods and services at any point of sale that accepts HUMO national system cards, as well as international payment systems VISA and Mastercard. When making a transaction, crypto-assets are automatically converted into fiat currency (UZS or USD) in real time, after which the payment is processed as a standard bank transaction.
widget.faq.item_12.value: Terms of Use of the Crypto Card
widget.faq.item_12.description:
- The card is available only to registered users who have passed second-level identity verification (KYC level Advanced).
- To activate the card, it is necessary to top up the card balance on the Asterium platform.
- All transactions and fees for using the card are displayed in the personal account.
- Transaction limits correspond to the user’s verification level and are specified when the card is issued.
